reviewText: Polly : The Wonderful World of Disneyyippee.this disney movie is a classic retelling of the story pollyanna. polly played by keisha knight pulliam shows she has a wonderful generous heart surely missed in todays world.the music is first rate along with the singing.i recomend this dvd to any disney or musical fan.an excellent disc.

reviewText: i have always loved this movie and to have it on dvd is truely a great thing for me i love and when i say love i mean i love my childhood and the memories i have of it is what i wished michael jackson had but any ways back to the movie this movie is so sweet and it pulls at my heart strings from beginning to the end and i just want to share this great movie with every one in the world this real gets to the point of what matters and kiesha  does such an incredible job that i can't believe right now she is not working starring in blockbuster movies. this girl has a gift for acting and everyone knows how good she was as rudy on the cosby show. the songs are great and the music why is there not a soundtrack i love the songs and lyrics and everything about this movie .a+a+a+a+a polly will always earn a A++ love it forever and ever thank you for reading my review i appeciate it

reviewText: This was a childhood favorite, and I looked for it on DVD for a LONG time!  I was SO GLAD to finally find it on Amazon!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Polly is a remake of the Pollyanna story with a wonderfully diverse twist.  Terrific acting and wonderful music.  The entertainment value is superb.  I never dreamed this was released on DVD and I was so happy to find it.  Most enjoyable for "kids of all ages".  Phylicia Rashad, Dorian Harewood, Celeste Holm and Keshia Knight Pulliam are a great combination telling a heartwarming story.
